  1. FIND OUT THE LATEST NEWS & HIGHLIGHTS
    Check out the latest and greatest that Kuna has to offer.

  1. Open Art Calls

    The Kuna Arts Commission currently has several open art calls available. Find out how your artistic skills can enhance the community we all call home. Read More

  2. Get Outdoors

    Swan Falls is on the Snake River about 19 miles from Kuna. It was built in 1901 to provide electricity to nearby mines. Today, Swan Falls is a favorite of outdoor enthusiasts offering fishing, rafting, boating, and more. Read More

  3. Sign Up for Notifications

    Stay up to date on the latest local news and events by signing up for email or text notifications. Read More

  4. City Parks

    Whether you're looking for a practice field, a playground, or just a walking trail or a scenic place to unplug, you are sure to find what you're looking for at one of our beautiful parks. Read More
